# Introduction
The `ggplot` package is based on _The Grammar of Graphics_. Its purpose is to
serve as a simple declarative framework for building rich (but static) 2D and 3D
charts and graphs.

All `ggplot` plots begin with the base function `ggplot()` in which the base data
frame and plot variables are specified.
